code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Student=()=>{const[students,setStudents]=useState([]);const[newStudent,setNewStudent]=useState({id:'',name:'',major:'',year:''});const addStudent=()=>{if(newStudent.id&&newStudent.name&&newStudent.major&&newStudent.year){setStudents([...students,newStudent]);setNewStudent({id:'',name:'',major:'',year:''});}else{alert('Please enter full information');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Student"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Student ID",value:newStudent.id,onChange:e=>setNewStudent({...newStudent,id:e.target.value}),className:"p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Full name",value:newStudent.name,onChange:e=>setNewStudent({...newStudent,name:e.target.value}),className:"p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:newStudent.major,onChange:e=>setNewStudent({...newStudent,major:e.target.value}),className:"p-2 border rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Choose major"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"ICT",children:"ICT -
